roleset.name: to make into a landfill, fill with garbage
roleset.note: LANDFILL-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from landfill.01-v)

example.name: Passive, descriptive usage
example.text: If *PRO* landfilled or incinerated *-1 , hazardous materials in common electronic products may be released *-2 into the soil , air or water .

example.name: ARG1
example.text: If landfilled or incinerated , hazardous materials in common electronic products may be released into the soil , air or water .
